request.description: Counts the number of notifications for the authenticated user. Returns the total as well as the number of unread notifications.
See the permissions for a given user.
Grant a permission to a user. After this call has returned, the user will be allowed to execute the given intent.
Revoke a permission from a user. After this call has returned, the user will no longer be able to execute the given intent.
